known_issues: App crashes on initial load (admin page) with Minified React error #185 after last rebuild.

existing_features.title: Identify and fix the root cause of the initial-load crash on the Admin page that triggers “Minified React error #185” (invalid hook call), so the app renders the Admin dashboard successfully on first load.

Improve crash diagnosability for future issues by ensuring the GlobalErrorBoundary’s “Technical Details” section provides actionable information for React #185 cases (e.g., include the raw error message and component stack without causing secondary errors), while keeping user-facing text in English.

projectName: Fix Admin initial-load crash (Minified React error #185)
